EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-XLE-Email-SBC for E Nurture-T001ZO.Email 4 Consideration
EmailTemplate.subject: This is how to modernize your contact center
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Use Case
Build a more efficient and secure contact center Your contact center plays a critical role in shaping the way customers perceive your products and services. But traditional PBX-based contact centers don’t protect the quality of IP voice very well, and complicated legacy networks result in dropped calls and a poor customer experience.
That’s no way to run a contact center.
With Nokia Enterprise Session Border Controller (SBC) you can take advantage of IP communication technologies, improve the customer experience and protect your contact center from cyberattacks.
Find out more in this use case. Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Digital Networks Marketing, Nokia © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> · Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> · Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Linkedin}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Facebook}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Youtube}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Blog}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
